source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
	B.db_schema as schema1,
	B.SPNAME as routine,
	B.filepath,
	B.filename,
	B.archivepath,
	B.daysub,
	B.occurrence,
	B.filecheck,
	B.SPPARM,
	B.destination_file_name as axwayFileName,
	B.axway_path as axwaypath,
	B.axway_server as axwayserver,
	B.axway_user_id as axwayuser,
	B.escape_char as Escapechar,
	B.delimiter,
	B.Quote,
	B.header 
from [ADW_PDW_EDW_STG].[PIPELINE_DATA_LOG] A join [ADW_PDW_EDW_STG].[ASBD_MASTER] B
on A.SPNAME = B.SPNAME AND A.FILENAME = B.FILENAME
WHERE EXECUTIONDATE = (SELECT CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) AND UPPER(STATUS) = 'FAILED'
